00027 
00028  SUBROUTINE Parameters
00029 
00030 ! Common Variables
00031  USE Domain
00032  USE FluidParams
00033  USE LBMParams
00034  IMPLICIT NONE
00035 
00036 ! Local Variables
00037  INTEGER :: i
00038  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00039 
00040 ! Read parameter data
00041  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "properties.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00042       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00043  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00044    READ(10,*)
00045    READ(10,*) Maxstep
00046    READ(10,*)
00047    READ(10,*) tStat, tDump
00048    READ(10,*)
00049    READ(10,*) xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
00050    READ(10,*)
00051    READ(10,*) rhoL, rhoH
00052    READ(10,*)
00053    READ(10,*) tauRho, tauPhi
00054    READ(10,*)
00055    READ(10,*) IntWidth, sigma, Gamma
00056    READ(10,*)
00057    READ(10,*) pConv
00058      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00059  ELSE
00060    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'properties.in'."
00061  END IF
00062 
00063 !  Read bubble positions
00064  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "discrete.in", STATUS = "OLD", ACTION = "READ", &
00065         IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00066  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00067    READ(10,*)
00068    READ(10,*) nBubbles
00069    READ(10,*)
00070    ALLOCATE( bubbles(1:nBubbles,1:3) )
00071    DO i = 1, nBubbles
00072      READ(10,*) bubbles(i,1), bubbles(i,2), bubbles(i,3)
00073    END DO
00074      CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00075  ELSE
00076    STOP "Error: Unable to open input file 'discrete.in'."
00077  END IF
00078 
00079 ! Fluid properties
00080  phiStar    = 0.5D0*(rhoH - rhoL)
00081  phiStar2   = phiStar*phiStar
00082  phiStar4   = phiStar2*phiStar2
00083  eta        = 1.D0/(tauPhi + 0.5D0)
00084  eta2       = 1.D0 - eta
00085  invEta2    = 0.5D0/eta
00086  invTauPhi  = 1.D0/tauphi
00087  invTauRho  = 1.D0/tauRho
00088  invTauRho2 = 1.D0 - 0.5D0*invTauRho
00089 
00090 ! Chemical potential parameters
00091  alpha   = 0.75D0*sigma/(IntWidth*phistar4)
00092  alpha4  = 4.D0*alpha
00093  kappa   = 0.50D0*alpha*(IntWidth*phistar)**2.D0
00094  kappa_6 = kappa*inv6
00095 
00096 ! Modified distribution weights for use in Collision
00097  Eg0T = Eg0C*invTauRho2
00098  Eg1T = Eg1C*invTauRho2
00099  Eg2T = Eg2C*invTauRho2
00100 
00101 ! Redefine MaxStep (iterate between 0 and MaxStep-1)
00102  MaxStep = MaxStep - 1
00103 
00104  RETURN
00105  END SUBROUTINE Parameters
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:43:00 2008 for ZSC-2D-STD by  1.5.6
